name: term-o
description: Simple and lightweight terminal for browser

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn webpack -c webpack.config.js --mode development --devtool cheap-module-source-map --watch --progress
scripts.build-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn webpack -c webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn webpack -c webpack.config.js --mode production

author: olmedoluis012@gmail.com
